backlog.Description: Tinder for Local Restaurants - App that helps solve the problem of picking a restaurant.
Progress Pics web app for dieters. Timestamps each photo. Eliminates fraud and it places a watermark on them.
Eat this. Not that. - Type in unhealthy food that youre craving and it gives you a list of healthy alternatives with recipes or options to buy online.
Spaced repition flashcard app for JS, HTML, CSS,
Tell your significant other when your headed home for work.
An app that makes JS code snippet inserts more easy for non-technical people. Its gives us access to your websites and files and it auto-inserts for you.
Create one job description and well post it everywhere it belongs.
Something similar to the flip eye glasses that eye doctors use to determine your vision except youre using websites to determine what style your clients like.

An app that starts project flashcards onto your phone /web browser whenever your wife says she wants something to eat. Its food images of food categories or restaurants that help her narrow down to 1 option.

Todo.Description: Derek Sivers on spaced repitition http://sivers.org/srs.

Doing.Description: - requests a positive review first and then feeds that into social media.
- uses the words unlock or level up to the bonus to some prize that is scarce (highest rated jerky of all time, secret flavor, secret style).
- gives you some free bonus points and then you ad to it (reciprocity - I give you something, you give me something)
